title: Monitor Gas Compressor Station
description: A control room operator monitors the health and performance of a natural gas compressor station to ensure it maintains pipeline pressure.

tasks.description: Review the dashboard showing key performance indicators (KPIs) for Compressor Unit C-301, including suction pressure, discharge pressure, and vibration.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms all KPIs are within their normal operating envelopes.

tasks.description: Receive a low-priority alert for high exhaust temperature on the compressor's engine.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator acknowledges the alert and begins investigation.

tasks.description: Create a maintenance notification for a technician to inspect the engine's cooling system during the next scheduled visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: A non-urgent work notification is created in the maintenance system.
